text: Far Cry 4 is a 2014 first-person shooter game made by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the successor to the 2012 video game Far Cry 3, and the fourth main game in the Far Cry series. == References == Category:2014 video games Category:Far Cry Category:Ubisoft games Category:First-person shooters Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Open- world video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Video game sequels Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox One games
title: Far Cry 4
